info.title: Elfur API
info.description:
API's to fetch and send data to FJS

Account

This is currently not used.

Employee

Fetch information about employees from Orri.

Organization

This controller is used to fetch information about organizations. In icelandic 'Stofnanir'.

Here you can find which Organization Units belong to an organization and get details about an organization.

Organization Employee

This controller is used to fetch information about employees in organizations or in organization units. In icelandic 'Stofnanir' or 'deildir / stofnunareiningar'.

Here you can find which employees belong to an organization or an organization unit.

OrganizationUnit

This controller gives more details about an organization unit. In icelandic 'deildir / stofnunareiningar'.

TimeRegistration

This controller contains endpoints to import, create, read, update and delete time registrations and import groups. One endpoint is used to send a batch of timeregistrations from Elfur to Orri.

Import time registration processes explained:

First the timeregistrations are saved to Elfur database. When the time registration "batch", called "Import Group" in Elfur, is ready, they are sent to Orri as a batch.

There are two ways to import time registrations to Elfur database. Via excel file or manually adding them to an import group.

Importing time registrations from an excel file, then process the time registrations to Orri. 1. {ServerURL}/v1/time_registration/import_from_excel - Returns an importGroupId. 2. {ServerURL}/v1/time_registration/process_time_registrations_import_group?importGroupId={importGroupId} - We get the importGroupId from step 1, the excel import. Create an import group and add time registrations to it. When all time registrations are added, process the time registrations to Orri. 1. {ServerURL}/v1/time_registration/create_import_group - Returns an importGroupId. 2. {ServerURL}/v1/time_registration/add_timeregistrations_to_import_group/{importGroupId}/{isFinalized} - Add time registrations to the import group. One or more at a time. - When last time registration is added, set isFinalized to true. 3. {ServerURL}/v1/time_registration/process_time_registrations_import_group?importGroupId={importGroupId}

Time registrations are now in Orri.

Vacancy

This controller contains endpoints to create, fetch, and modify vacancies and submit vacancy statistics.

Refer to the NewVacancyDto schema at the bottom of this page for what fields are available when creating a vacancy.
Refer to the UpdateVacancyDto schema at the bottom of this page for what fields are available when updating a vacancy.

When updating a vacancy, any number of fields can be included - only those included will be changed. However, the "updatedBy" field must always be included.

When creating a vacancy, the following fields are required and must not be empty:

  • "heading": "string"
  • "jobTitle": "string"
  • "publishDate": "2025-05-13T15:12:42.200Z"
  • "openTo": "2025-05-13T15:12:42.200Z"
  • "introduction": "string"
  • "assignments": "string"
  • "qualifications": "string"
  • "moreInfo": "string"
  • "orgName": "string"
  • "contact1Name": "string"
  • "contact1JobTitle": "string"
  • "contact1EmailAddress": "string"
  • "contact1PhoneNumber": "string"
  • "webLinkUrl": "string"
  • "hoursRatio": "string"
  • "unionName": "string"
  • "locations": "string"
  • "createdBy": "string"
  • "sourceSystem": "string"

When updating a vacancy, the following restrictions apply:

  • "openTo" must be at least 10 days later from when the vacancy is updated.

When creating OR updating a vacancy, the following restrictions apply:

  • "publishDate" and "openTo" must be in the future
  • "publishDate" must be at least 10 days earlier than "openTo"
  • "openTo" must be a working day (not a weekend day nor an Icelandic holiday (rau√∞ur dagur))
  • If "contact2Name" is provided then "contact2JobTitle", "contact2EmailAddress" and "contact2PhoneNumber" must be provided as well
    • When updating, this only applies if "contact2JobTitle", "contact2EmailAddress" and "contact2PhoneNumber" do not already exist in the vacancy
  • "contact1PhoneNumber" and "contact2PhoneNumber" can only contain numbers and optionally phone number related characters ("-", "+", "(", ")", or whitespace)
  • "webLinkUrl" must be a valid URL that returns a valid response

There is also an endpoint to add vacancy statistics which users are required to use to once the hiring process for the corresponding vacancy is finished.
Refer to the NewVacancyStatsDto schema at the bottom of this page for what fields should be included when submitting.

OpenInvoices

This controller provides endpoints to fetch data related to open invoices.

The /v1/openinvoices/invoices endpoint supports the following filter parameters:

  • limit: Maximum number of invoices to return (default: 50, max: 100)
  • after: Cursor for next page (pagination)
  • before: Cursor for previous page (pagination)
  • dateFrom: Optional start date for filtering invoices (inclusive, DateOnly format). If not set, defaults to one month ago.
  • dateTo: Optional end date for filtering invoices (inclusive, DateOnly format). If not set, defaults to today.
  • types: Optional list of invoice type IDs to filter by. Use the IDs returned by the /types endpoint. If left empty, all types are included.
  • suppliers: Optional list of supplier IDs to filter by. Use the IDs returned by the /suppliers endpoint. If left empty, all suppliers are included.
  • customers: Optional list of customer IDs to filter by. Use the IDs returned by the /customers endpoint. If left empty, all customers are included.

Note: To get the available filter values, use the following helper endpoints:

  • /v1/openinvoices/types - Returns available invoice types with their IDs
  • /v1/openinvoices/suppliers - Returns available suppliers with their IDs
  • /v1/openinvoices/customers - Returns available customers with their IDs

Filter Syntax: When providing multiple IDs for types, suppliers, or customers, repeat the parameter name for each value:

  • Single ID: /v1/openinvoices/invoices?suppliers=123
  • Multiple IDs: /v1/openinvoices/invoices?suppliers=123&suppliers=456&suppliers=789
  • Combined filters: /v1/openinvoices/invoices?types=1&types=2&suppliers=123&customers=456&customers=789

[GET] Get a list of organizations (ie. stofnunum).
This endpoint fetches data from FJS database.

parameters.name: validFrom
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by date. The start date of the organization.

parameters.name: validTo
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by date. The end date of the organization.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter to filter down the organization list.

parameters.name: isSalaryPayer
parameters.description: If 1 then we get all organizations that pay salarys, it is the default value. If 0 then we get all projects.

parameters.description: (Optional) Offset for pagination. Row where to start fetching from.

parameters.name: fetchSize
parameters.description: (Optional) Fetch size for pagination. How many rows to fetch.

get.summary: [GET] Basic check to see if controller is living.

[GET] Get a list of employees by organization number or/and by organization unit id.
This endpoint fetches data from FJS database.
get.description:
If organization unit number is set then only employees for that organization unit will be returned.

If activeOnly is set to true, only employees with AssignmentStatusGroup = 'ACTIVE_ASSIGN' will be returned.

parameters.name: organizationNumber
parameters.description: Organization number (ie. stofnun).

parameters.name: organizationUnitNumber
parameters.description: (Optional) Organization unit number (ie. deild). If used, only employees for the given OU will be returned. If not set or set to 0, all employees for that organization will be returned.

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, returns only active employees (AssignmentStatusGroup = 'ACTIVE_ASSIGN'). If false or not provided, returns all employees.

parameters.name: rowOffset
parameters.description: (Optional) Offset for pagination. Row where to start fetching from.

parameters.name: fetchSize
parameters.description: (Optional) Fetch size for pagination. How many rows to fetch.

post.summary:
[POST] Import time registrations from excel file.
This endpoint adds data from excel file to Elfur database.

[POST] Process time registrations to Orri.
This endpoint sends data from Elfur database to Orri.

parameters.name: importGroupId
parameters.description: The id of the import group (ie. batch) to send to Orri.

parameters.name: validateOnly
parameters.description: (Optional) Flag to indicate if the batch should only be validated and not processed. Default is 'N' which means the batch will be processed.

post.summary:
[POST] Create an empty import group.
This endpoint creates data (ImportGroup table) in Elfur database.

[POST] Add time registrations and connect them to an import group.
This endpoint creates data (TimeRegistrationImport table) in Elfur database.

parameters.name: importGroupId
parameters.description: The import group id to add the new time registrations.

parameters.name: isFinalized
parameters.description: (Optional) Default false. Set as true if those are the last time registrations for this group. Then the item group will be marked as ready to send to Orri.

requestBody.description: List of time registrations to add.

delete.summary:
[DELETE] Delete an import group and all time registrations in it.
This endpoint deletes data from Elfur database.

parameters.name: importGroupId
parameters.description: The import group id to delete.

delete.summary:
[DELETE] Delete time registration list from an import group.
This endpoint deletes data from Elfur database.

parameters.name: importGroupId
parameters.description: The import group id to delete time registrations from.

requestBody.description: The list of time registration import ids to delete.

InvoicePaymentDetailResponseDto.description:
Represents a comprehensive data transfer object for invoice payment details with associated invoice and GL line data.
Data is mapped from v_InvoicePayments with LEFT JOINs to v_Invoice and v_InvoiceGL tables.
GL line items are grouped as a nested collection to avoid data duplication.

OpenInvoiceDetailResponseDto.description:
Represents a comprehensive data transfer object for an open invoice with all dimension data.
Data is mapped from the fact_Invoice table with LEFT JOINs to dimension tables.

totalPaymentsSum.description: Gets or sets the total sum of each invoice group invoices

totalPaymentCount.description: Gets or sets the total count invoice group invoices

OpenInvoiceGroupResponseDto.description: Represents all invoices between a specified supplier-customer relationship

invoices.description: Gets or sets a list of invoices belonging to the group

periodSumPaymentAmountsISK.description: Gets or sets the total sum of period payment amounts in ISK

periodPaymentCount.description: Gets or sets the total count of period payments

OpenInvoiceGroupWithInvoicesResponseDto.description: Represents all invoices between a specified supplier-customer relationship

totalCount.description: Gets or sets the number invoice groups

totalPaymentsSum.description: Gets or sets the total payment sum for all groups

totalPaymentsCount.description: Gets or sets the total payment count for all groups

invoiceGroups.description: Gets or sets the customer information

OpenInvoicesGroupCollectionResponseDto.description: Represents a collection of invoices between a specified supplier-customer relationship

Gets or sets the isOrganization. Tells if the organization is an organization/institution (1) or a project (0).
Institutions pay salary to employees, projects do not.

tags.name: Account
tags.description: Account controller, fetch data from Orri. Used for account verification.

tags.name: AccountingMasterData
tags.description:
Accounting Master Data controller, used to get information about accounting master data.
Accounting Master Data is equivalent to B√≥khaldsstofng√∂gn in Icelandic.

tags.name: Employee
tags.description: Employee controller, fetch data from Orri. Used to get information about an employee and lookup a group of employees.

tags.name: OpenInvoices
tags.description: Controller for querying open invoices data.

tags.name: Organization
tags.description:
Organization controller, used to get information about an organization and lookup a group of organizations.
Organization is equivalent to Stofnun in Icelandic.

tags.name: OrganizationEmployee
tags.description:
Organization Employee controller, used to get information about employees in organization or organization unit.
This controller fetches data from FJS database.

tags.name: OrganizationUnit
tags.description:
Organization unit controller, used to get information about an organization unit and lookup a group of organization units.
Organization unit is equivalent to Stofnunareining/Deild in Icelandic.

tags.name: TimeRegistration
tags.description:
Time registration controller, used to register time for employees and send the time registrations to Orri.
This controller interacts with both FJS databases and Orri.

tags.name: Vacancy
tags.description:
Vacancy controller, used to get information about a vacancy and lookup a group of vacancies.
Vacancy is equivalent to Laust Starf in Icelandic.

tags.name: ElfurBase
tags.description: Base controller for elfur, all other controllers should inherit it.
